#include <stdio.h>
#include <string>
#include <algorithm>
#include <math.h>
#include <iostream>
#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int main() {
    int t;
    scanf ("%d",&t);
    while (t--)
    {
        string a,b;
        int ca[26]={0},cb[26]={0},count=0;
        cin>>a>>b;
        for (int i=0;i<a.length();i++)
            ca[a[i]-97]++;
        for (int i=0;i<b.length();i++)
            cb[b[i]-97]++;
        for (int i=0;i<26;i++)
            if (ca[i]==cb[i])
                count++;
        if (count==26)
            printf ("YES\n");
        else printf ("NO\n");
    }
	return 0;
}
